findings.title: PAV - Pair Address Validation
findings.description: The `setAMMPair` function allows any user to set any arbitrary value without validation to the `AMMPairs` mapping, which is supposed to hold Uniswap pair addresses. This lack of validation can lead to unintended behavior, including the potential disruption of the contract's intended functionality.

findings.title: RCS - Redundant Conditional Statement
findings.description: The conditional statement `if (false || _buddhamarketingPending > 0)` is redundant because `_buddhamarketingPending > 0` has already been checked earlier within the transfer function.

findings.title: RAO - Redundant Addition Operation
findings.description: The contract includes code segments with redundant addition operations with zero. These additions are unnecessary, as adding any number to zero yields the same result.

findings.title: RVD - Redundant Variable Declaration
findings.description: The contract declares certain variables that are not used in a meaningful way by the contract.

findings.title: RSW - Redundant Storage Writes
findings.description: The contract performs redundant storage writes when the provided parameter matches the current state of the variables, leading to unnecessary gas consumption and inefficiencies in contract execution.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: The code does not adhere to the Solidity naming conventions, which can negatively impact readability and maintainability.

findings.title: L13 - Divide before Multiply Operation
findings.description: Performing divisions before multiplications may cause loss of precision.
